version_description:
Version 3.1.0 contains the following goodies:

- Added support for AskiaFaceDescription
- Added support for Amazon S3 resource upload
- Added support for iTunes files share
- Fixed an issue with special characters in Response Blocks

This version includes:
- Updated Base SDK to iOS 9.3
- Added Remove survey feature
- Integrated UI for remove survey feature
- Added specific warning when deleting a survey with / without interviews
- Fix when resuming interview on a preliminary selection loops
- Fix on response blocks that contain MS Word's `â€¦` special character
Fixes an issue with in-progress interviews that would appear as Error in Modify interview panel.

This major version update of Askiaface includes the following goodies:
- Full support for askiafield 5.4 quota management
- Added manual management of askiafield 5.3.5 quota management
- Added Crashlytics for improved error logging
- Implementation of new 5.4 AskiaScript
- Application transitioned to ARC to improve memory management
- Fixed various issues with routings
- Fixed issue with ADCs not rendering
- Fixed issue when syncing interviews with quota data
- Fixed an issue with AWS resource upload
- Fixed a memory leak when syncing interviews with AWS resources
- Fixed an issue where interview description was no longer displayed in Modify interviews panel
- Fixed missing interview date in Modify interviews
- Fixed an issue that would prevent the interview file name to be displayed when Askiaface Description was missing.

This minor update includes:
- Fix for weird, strange & bizarre error when using Arabic with Format
- Latest quota changes for compatibility with Askiafield version 5.4.4

This minor update includes:
- Fixed an issue with live screens
- Fixed an issue with script translation when a Shortcut uses a keyword
- Updated survey XML serialisation
- Fixed XML routing with forward declaration

This minor update includes:

- Fixed blocking 'New interview' pop-up that would cause an interview to start in the background

- Fixed IsMatch: improved emergency Format
- Fix for Ignored quotas
- Added NSMicrophoneUsageDescription and NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription as required by iOS 10 for privacy reasons

This minor update includes:
- Fixed crash when granting camera access

This minor update includes:
- Fixed bug with apostrophe

- Added timeout to Sync in order to allow Askiafield server to react to potential quota changes
- Fixed issues with quota sync
- Added DeviceID retrieval
- Added support for AutoLayout

Included in this version:
- Fixed an issue with auto-sync during in-progress interviews in kiosk mode
